meanings.definition: A hormone secreted by the pituitary gland that stimulates the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent1: The corticotropins help the adrenal cortex work better.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use corticotropins to treat certain conditions.
meanings.sent3: The corticotropins in the body are like cheerleaders for the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels soared as if fueled by corticotropins.
meanings.sent5: The corticotropins act like a wake-up call for the adrenal cortex.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of polypeptides that stimulate the adrenal cortex.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying different types of corticotropins.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes need corticotropins to boost their performance.
meanings.sent3: The corticotropins gathered around the adrenal cortex for a pep talk.
meanings.sent4: His words were like corticotropins, motivating everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The corticotropins worked together to revitalize the adrenal cortex.
